statements: SELECT * FROM market_news_sentiment ORDER BY sentiment_id DESC;
SELECT headline, sentiment_score FROM market_news_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM market_news_sentiment WHERE publish_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT headline, publish_date FROM market_news_sentiment ORDER BY publish_date ASC;
SELECT sentiment_id, headline, sentiment_score FROM market_news_sentiment ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT headline, sentiment_score FROM market_news_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM market_news_sentiment WHERE headline LIKE '%market%' AND sentiment_score < 0 ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC;
SELECT headline, sentiment_score FROM market_news_sentiment WHERE publish_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY publish_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS highest_sentiment_score FROM market_news_sentiment;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_sentiment_score, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM market_news_sentiment;
SELECT * FROM market_news_sentiment;
SELECT news_title, sentiment_score FROM market_news_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT news_id, news_title FROM market_news_sentiment ORDER BY news_id DESC;
SELECT decision_description, execution_date FROM trading_decisions WHERE trade_amount > 1000;
SELECT news_title, sentiment_score FROM market_news_sentiment WHERE news_title LIKE '%stock%';
SELECT news_title, sentiment_score FROM market_news_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY news_id DESC
SELECT * FROM trading_decisions WHERE execution_date >= '2022-01-01' AND trade_amount > 1000 ORDER BY trade_amount ASC
SELECT news_title, sentiment_score FROM market_news_sentiment WHERE news_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT decision_description, trade_amount FROM trading_decisions WHERE decision_description LIKE '%buy%' OR decision_description LIKE '%sell%' ORDER BY decision_id
SELECT news_title, sentiment_score FROM market_news_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score < 0.3 OR news_title LIKE '%market%'
SELECT * FROM market_news_sentiment;
SELECT article_title, sentiment_score FROM market_news_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT article_id, article_title, analysis_date FROM analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT article_title, trading_action, trading_price FROM market_news_sentiment INNER JOIN trading_decisions ON market_news_sentiment.article_id = trading_decisions.analysis_id;
SELECT * FROM trading_decisions WHERE trading_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM market_news_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT article_title, sentiment_score FROM market_news_sentiment WHERE article_id = 10;
SELECT article_title, sentiment_score FROM market_news_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.4 AND 0.6 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, article_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM market_news_sentiment JOIN analysis_results ON market_news_sentiment.article_id = analysis_results.article_id WHERE analysis_result = 'Positive';
SELECT article_id, COUNT(*) AS num_decisions FROM trading_decisions GROUP BY article_id HAVING num_decisions > 5 ORDER BY num_decisions DESC;
SELECT * FROM news_articles;
SELECT title, content FROM news_articles WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT article_id, title, sentiment_score FROM news_articles ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT trader_name, trader_location FROM traders;
SELECT article_id, overall_sentiment, sentiment_date FROM market_sentiment WHERE sentiment_date = '2022-05-11';
SELECT * FROM news_articles;
SELECT title, sentiment_score FROM news_articles WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT article_id, title, content FROM news_articles ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT traders.trader_name, traders.trader_location, trading_decisions.buy_sell FROM traders INNER JOIN trading_decisions ON traders.trader_id = trading_decisions.article_id;

SELECT market_sentiment.sentiment_id, market_sentiment.overall_sentiment, market_sentiment.sentiment_date, traders.trader_name FROM market_sentiment LEFT JOIN traders ON market_sentiment.article_id = traders.trader_id;
SELECT article_id, article_title, publish_date FROM news_articles;
SELECT source_name, source_country FROM sources ORDER BY source_type DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, sentiment_category FROM analysis_results WHERE sentiment_category = 'Positive';
SELECT decision_date, trade_action, trade_amount FROM trade_decisions WHERE trade_amount > 1000 ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM news_articles
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM news_articles WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT source_type FROM sources
SELECT source_name, source_country FROM sources ORDER BY source_country DESC
SELECT users.user_name, trade_decisions.decision_date, trade_decisions.trade_amount FROM users JOIN trade_decisions ON users.user_id = trade_decisions.decision_id
